channel.title: Donator Right; Ranks for Delta
channel.description:
Hello, I'am using pkerslyfe source for my source... [[317 delta]] And in the character files it says [code][CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 0000 character-posy = 0000 character-rights = 0 character-lastconnection = 0 character-special = 0 character-tz = 0 character-starter = 0 character-pouch1 = 0 character-pouch2 = 0 character-pouch3 = 0 character-pouch4 = 0 character-energy = 0 character-taskID = 0 character-taskAmount = 0 character-jad = 10 character-q1 = 15 character-q2 = 15 character-q3 = 15 character-q4 = 15 character-q5 = 15 character-q6 = 15 character-q7 = 15 character-q8 = 15 character-q9 = 15 character-q10 = 15 character-q11 = 15 character-brightness = 4 character-fighttype = 2 character-skill = 2 character-chat = 0 character-ancients = 0 character-pin = 0 character-saradomin = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 0 character-pcpoints = 0 character-assault = 0 character-donator = 0 character-bow = 100 character-shield = 100[/code]
And It says [b]Character-donator = 0[/b] what do I change the 0 (NUMBER) to make the Icon be infront of there name during game play?
Please tell me I'am really stuck with this one.

item.title: Donator Right; Ranks for Delta
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

It means the code that shows the icon is in the client rather than the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Right; Ranks for Delta
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

what does it mean… lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Right; Ranks for Delta
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

monkey money30:

Still no… The icon dosn’t show up.

You do know that it’s client sided, also. I recommend that you look at this tutorial.

Read full topic

I’m not to sure why but thats just how it is i suppose.

item.title: Donator Right; Ranks for Delta

Hello, I’am using pkerslyfe source for my source… [[317 delta]] And in the character files it says

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 0000 character-posy = 0000 character-rights = 0 character-lastconnection = 0 character-special = 0 character-tz = 0 character-starter = 0 character-pouch1 = 0 character-pouch2 = 0 character-pouch3 = 0 character-pouch4 = 0 character-energy = 0 character-taskID = 0 character-taskAmount = 0 character-jad = 10 character-q1 = 15 character-q2 = 15 character-q3 = 15 character-q4 = 15 character-q5 = 15 character-q6 = 15 character-q7 = 15 character-q8 = 15 character-q9 = 15 character-q10 = 15 character-q11 = 15 character-brightness = 4 character-fighttype = 2 character-skill = 2 character-chat = 0 character-ancients = 0 character-pin = 0 character-saradomin = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 0 character-pcpoints = 0 character-assault = 0 character-donator = 0 character-bow = 100 character-shield = 100
